thread.section_title: BookIt.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BookIt.com | bookit.com | 4 of 701
thread.title: E Anderson

author: E Anderson
title: E Anderson
text: When trying to complete booking of my trip, the website threw me out, and wanted all the information resubmitted (after I received a SUCCESS screen flash). Not wanting to get billed twice, I contacted customer service directly. The representative was very nice and helpful, BUT she couldn't match on her screen the same low price that I was Quote: d. Her cheapest option was $600 more, and the flights weren't as good. I took a deep breath, and resubmitted the information. VOILA! It confirmed and went through, credit card billed, and and sent me the itinerary at the same price that I originally wanted. Now, I just hope that the all-inclusive resort I chose to visit in April lives up to its name! If so, we will definitely be back to BookIt.
